mapper.sql: bip_id, bip_citizenid, bip_sex, bip_age, bip_name, bip_birthday, bip_minzu, bip_zzmm, bip_hyzk, bip_hjxz, bip_rylb, bip_jkzk, bip_cjqk, bip_eyesightleft, bip_eyesightright, bip_long, bip_weight, bip_hkszd, bip_whcd, bip_subject, bip_graduateschool, bip_bysj, bip_educationallevel2, bip_con_telephone, bip_con_mobile, bip_con_email, bip_con_postcode, bip_con_contact, bip_con_contacttel, bip_res_address, bip_t_lowersecurity, bip_t_criminal, bip_t_destitute, bip_t_peasant, bip_t_veteran, bip_t_othercities, bip_t_czjyyhz, bip_t_rhfl, bip_t_newgraduate, bip_pc_dj, bip_pc_slcd, bip_resume, bip_qtsm
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from bip
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT bip.bip_id bipId,bip_name bipName,sex.cd_name sex,bip_age age,cdl_specialty.cd_name gz,cdg_regioncode.cd_name address,djb.DJSJ createDate FROM bip LEFT JOIN zj_grqzdjb djb ON djb.bip_id=bip.bip_id LEFT JOIN zj_grqzgzb gzb ON djb.qzbh=gzb.QZBH LEFT JOIN cdl_specialty ON cdl_specialty.cd_id=gzb.GZ LEFT JOIN cdg_sex sex ON sex.cd_id=bip.bip_sex LEFT JOIN cdg_marriage marriage ON marriage.cd_id=bip_hyzk LEFT JOIN cdg_educationallevel ON cdg_educationallevel.cd_id=bip_whcd LEFT JOIN cdl_personneltype ON cdl_personneltype.cd_id=bip_rylb LEFT JOIN cdg_healthstate ON cdg_healthstate.cd_id=bip_jkzk LEFT JOIN cdg_regioncode ON cdg_regioncode.cd_id=bip.bip_hkszd LEFT JOIN zj_tjxxhzb ON zj_tjxxhzb.QZGZBH=gzb.QZGZBH WHERE gzb.GZ=#{gz} AND bip_sex=#{bipSex} AND bip_hyzk=#{bipHyzk} AND bip_whcd=#{bipWhcd} AND bip_hjxz=#{bipHjxz} AND bip_rylb=#{bipRylb} AND bip_jkzk=#{bipJkzk} AND bip_t_newgraduate=#{bipTNewgraduate} AND djb.gzdq=#{gzdq} AND djb.SFDJ="n" AND bip_age>#{minAge} AND #{maxAge}>bip_age AND zj_tjxxhzb.SFHZ='0'

SELECT bip.bip_id bipId,bip_citizenid bipSfz,bip_name bipName,sex.cd_name bipSex,bip_age bipAge,cdg_nation.cd_name bipMz,cdg_politicsaspect.cd_name bipZzmm,marriage.cd_name bipHyzk,cdl_rprtype.cd_name bipHjxz,cdl_personneltype.cd_name bipRylb, cdg_healthstate.cd_name bipJkzk,cdg_deformity.cd_name bipCjqk, bip_eyesightleft bipLeft,bip_eyesightright bipRight,bip_long bipLong,bip_weight bipWeight,bip_hkszd bipHkszd,bip_resume bipResume, cdg_educationallevel.cd_name bipWhcd,bip_subject bipSubject,bip_graduateschool bipSchool,bip_bysj bipBysj,cdg_educationallevel.cd_name bipWhcd2, bip_con_telephone bipTel,bip_con_mobile bipMobile,bip_con_email bipEmail,bip_con_postcode bipPostcode,bip_con_contact bipContact,bip_con_contacttel bipContacttel, bip_res_address bipJaddress,bip_qtsm bipQtsm,bip_t_lowersecurity bipLow,bip_t_criminal bipCriminal,bip_t_destitute bipDestitute,bip_t_peasant bipPeasant,bip_t_veteran bipVeteran,bip_t_othercities bipOthercities, bip_t_czjyyhz bipCzjyyhz,bip_t_rhfl bipRhfl,bip_t_newgraduate bipNewgraduate, cdx_computergrade.cd_name bipPc,cdl_orgtype.cd_name Dwxz,cdg_industry.cd_name Dwhy, cdg_regtype.cd_name Jjlx,djb.SFJSDX Sfjsdx,djb.SFCJPX Sfcjpx,djb.SFJSZYZD Sfjszyzd, cdl_specialty.cd_name gz,bip.bip_hkszd address,djb.DJSJ createDate,gzb.GZ gzbh,gzb.ZDYX zdyx,gzb.ZGYX zgyx FROM bip LEFT JOIN zj_grqzdjb djb ON djb.bip_id=bip.bip_id LEFT JOIN zj_grqzgzb gzb ON djb.qzbh=gzb.QZBH LEFT JOIN cdl_specialty ON cdl_specialty.cd_id=gzb.GZ LEFT JOIN cdg_sex sex ON sex.cd_id=bip.bip_sex LEFT JOIN cdg_marriage marriage ON marriage.cd_id=bip_hyzk LEFT JOIN cdg_educationallevel ON cdg_educationallevel.cd_id=bip_whcd LEFT JOIN cdl_personneltype ON cdl_personneltype.cd_id=bip_rylb LEFT JOIN cdg_healthstate ON cdg_healthstate.cd_id=bip_jkzk LEFT JOIN cdg_nation ON cdg_nation.cd_id=bip_minzu LEFT JOIN cdg_politicsaspect ON cdg_politicsaspect.cd_id=bip_zzmm LEFT JOIN cdl_rprtype ON cdl_rprtype.cd_id=bip_hjxz LEFT JOIN cdg_deformity ON cdg_deformity.cd_id=bip_cjqk LEFT JOIN cdx_computergrade ON cdx_computergrade.cd_id=bip_pc_dj LEFT JOIN cdl_orgtype ON cdl_orgtype.cd_id=djb.dwxx LEFT JOIN cdg_industry ON cdg_industry.cd_id=djb.dwhy LEFT JOIN cdg_regtype ON cdg_regtype.cd_id=djb.dwjjlx WHERE bip.bip_id in (${bipId}) AND djb.SFDJ="n"

SELECT bip.bip_id bipId,bip.bip_name bipName,cdg_sex.cd_name bipSex,bip.bip_age bipAge,bip.bip_con_mobile bipTel,grqzdjb.DJSJ djsj,grqzdjb.GDSJ gdsj FROM bip LEFT JOIN zj_grqzdjb grqzdjb ON grqzdjb.bip_id=bip.bip_id LEFT JOIN zj_grqzgzb grqzgzb ON grqzgzb.QZBH=grqzdjb.qzbh LEFT JOIN cdg_sex ON cdg_sex.cd_id=bip.bip_sex WHERE bip.bip_citizenid=#{bipSfz} AND bip.bip_name=#{bipName} AND bip.bip_sex=#{bipSex} AND bip.bip_age>=#{minAge} AND #{maxAge}>=bip.bip_age AND #{whcd1}>=bip.bip_whcd AND bip.bip_whcd>=#{whcd2} AND bip.bip_hyzk=#{hyzk} AND bip.bip_jkzk=#{jkzk} AND STR_TO_DATE(grqzdjb.DJSJ,"%Y-%m-%d")>=STR_TO_DATE(#{djsj1},"%Y-%m-%d") AND STR_TO_DATE(#{djsj2},"%Y-%m-%d")>=STR_TO_DATE(grqzdjb.DJSJ,"%Y-%m-%d") AND bip.bip_zzmm=#{zzmm} AND grqzgzb.GZ=#{qzgw} AND bip.bip_rylb=#{rylb} AND bip.bip_hjxz=#{hjxz} AND IF(#{cxfw}='qb',1,IF(#{cxfw}='gd',grqzdjb.GDSJ!='',grqzdjb.GDSJ=''))
mapper.insert: insert into bip (bip_id, bip_citizenid, bip_sex, bip_age, bip_name, bip_birthday, bip_minzu, bip_zzmm, bip_hyzk, bip_hjxz, bip_rylb, bip_jkzk, bip_cjqk, bip_eyesightleft, bip_eyesightright, bip_long, bip_weight, bip_hkszd, bip_whcd, bip_subject, bip_graduateschool, bip_bysj, bip_educationallevel2, bip_con_telephone, bip_con_mobile, bip_con_email, bip_con_postcode, bip_con_contact, bip_con_contacttel, bip_res_address, bip_t_lowersecurity, bip_t_criminal, bip_t_destitute, bip_t_peasant, bip_t_veteran, bip_t_othercities, bip_t_czjyyhz, bip_t_rhfl, bip_t_newgraduate, bip_pc_dj, bip_pc_slcd, bip_resume, bip_qtsm) values (#{bipId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bipCitizenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bipSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bipAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bipName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bipBirthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bipMinzu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bipZzmm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bipHyzk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bipHjxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
